Midas Documentation

SECTION 13: Document Navigation and Convention



  • Navigating this document
  • Document Style

Navigating this document

  • Use the "Search" box at top right of each page
  • This document is divided into sections containing one or more pages.
  • Each page has navigation icons at the top and bottom to enable navigation between pages and sections.
    • blue symbols navigate between pages,
    • yellow symbols navigate between sections.
  • There are also navigation icons to jump to the Alphabetical Documentation Index and the Section Contents.


Navigation

PAGE

SECTION

page down - go to bottom of this page

page up - go to top of this page

go to start of this document

page left - go to bottom of previous page

page right - go to top of next page

page contents - go to list of pages in THIS section

Alphabetical Index to Documentation pages

section up - go to start of THIS section

section left - go to start of PREVIOUS section

section right - go to start of NEXT section

go to list of sections in this document

Placing mouse over navigation symbols will display a description of the tag's destination.



Document Style

  • New Features :
    • This feature is new since this date
  • ODB paths should appears like this :
    • /Equipment/test
  • Midas Utilities :
    • midas_utility
  • JavaScript functions :
    • ODBGet
  • HTML tags :
    • <img ...>
  • ODB tags (in HTML files) :
    • <odb...>
  • Image titles should appear like this :
    • Figure 1 Example
  • Warnings :
    • This is a Warning
  • Notes :
    • This is important
  • or so is this
